title.main: The Full Potential Of Your Business.

gap.title: See the customers for whom we have gained experience and how we have implemented it.
gap.description: This list doesn't include clients that want to stay anonymously

header1.title: What We Do?
header1.text: Digitization for Small and Medium-sized companies

header2.title: Need help with your Digital Marketing?
header2.text: Let us do what we do best so you can focus on your business. Our admin panel will help you analyse and manage your business to increase your revenue.

header1.title: Quick. Ruaranteed. Focused.
header1.text: Web Development & Mobile App Development, UX / UI Design

header2.title: How long will it take to make the site?
header2.text: Of course, it depends on the size of the company, but we did everything we could to do it the fastest way, we have many templates, we only work on one project and we have flexible code. In this way, the development of a website takes 2-3 weeks on average.

header3.title: What guarantees do you give me?
header3.text: Our reputation and the quality of our product are very important to us, so we work first, and only if you like it, you pay the first part of the money, also we take only half of the specified amount of the project, the other part is a deposit for 1 month, so if you find a mistake, we will fix it and you can keep the other part as compensation

step1.title: Submit Your Design Request
step1.text: We need information about your business and your preferred design style so we can create the best design for you

step2.title: We Start Working
step2.text: After you agree with the design, we start developing the website. You will be able to see the changes every day, so you will be up to date with the progress.

step3.title: Get Your Project Done!
step3.text: We publish your site on the previous domain or on a new domain. You will receive all permissions for the site and ... Congratulation !

header.title: Why Partner With Us?
header.description: What Our Clients Said About FOYS

clientsReviews.name: Joe Preston
clientsReviews.review: Realy nice agengcy that was online all day during development, the price is fantatic, GL foys.

clientsReviews.name: Ivonette Schäfer
clientsReviews.review: Can't say much, will keep on working.

clientsReviews.name: Kühn
clientsReviews.review: We had problems on the client side and thought that scraping was not possible, but they surprised us with the brilliant idea of splitting the server into several smaller servers, so they managed the task successfully.

clientsReviews.name: Anonymous
clientsReviews.review: Nice design, thanx for great work!

clientsReviews.name: Zimmermann Fritz
clientsReviews.review: They really helped us with data management, everything was done on the agreed date and at a reasonable price. I was very taken with Andrew running the company at such a young age, incredible.
